participant_1.background:
I'd love to have lunch with my old coach, who taught me everything I know about football.
i am a deaf man.
I read fantasy novels to escape my reality.
I play music to cheer myself up.
i love to eat shrimp and lobster.

participant_2.background:
I have no children, but I do enjoy a refreshing Coke while I'm relocating my troops.
it s one of my favorite hobbies.
I spend my days drawing, painting and making games that help animals in need.
i work in a warehouse.
i cannot choose between lollipops and rainbows.

content.text: Doing good! I am deaf and I love to read fantasy novels to escape my reality. What do you like to do to relax?
I enjoy drawing, painting and making games that help animals in need. I also work in a warehouse.
That sounds really fun! I have never heard of making games to help animals.
It's a lot of fun! I like to make games that teach kids about animals and how to help them.
That's great! I love animals too. I have always wanted to be a vet, but I am not able to talk.
I'm sure you would be a great vet! You seem very caring and passionate about animals.
No problem! What is your favorite animal?
I love elephants! They are so intelligent and majestic.
Elephants are great! They are one of my favorite animals too.
They are so cute! I would love to see one in person one day.
I hope you get to see one soon! They are amazing animals.
Thank you! I hope so too.
No problem! Have a great day!
